name: Hunter Hitman
summary: Hunter Hitman is an action game where you play as a hitman armed with just a knife and your skills in the assassination. Sneak up on your enemies and eliminate them all. Kill multiple targets in a short time, and you will get a combo. Earn coins and unlock cards to obtain different character skins. Come back daily to collect daily rewards. Uncover loot boxes that yield cards. Assemble 3 of the same cards to upgrade your characters.
